summary: REQ-4 and REQ-5 appear implemented: a dedicated A-words page was added, navigation from the A–Z page to the A-words page is provided (via clicking the “A” tile), the A-words page has a title, a responsive grid list, and a back button. The A-words list is static and contains >25 entries. Some additional project metadata/documentation files were modified/added that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained repository metadata/docs files (project state and frontend file summary) unrelated to adding the A-words page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add a second page and static A-word list; it does not request updating project tracking/summary files.
